description:
Aizen’s revelation that Ichigo is his greatest research subject throws Ichigo into a state of shock. But before Aizen can reveal Ichigo’s most startling secret he is interrupted by an unexpected person arriving on the scene.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La choquante vérité... Le mystérieux pouvoir intérieur d`Ichigo
Shougeki no Shinjitsu... Ichigo ni Himerareta Chikara!
The Shocking Truth...The Mysterious Power Within Ichigo!
衝撃の真実... 一護に秘められた力!
